{"id":1235311490,"question_id":7,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â month, 1Â week","timestamp":1713400435,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1235311490/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"N/A","code":"public class Solution {\n    public int reverse(int x) {\n        int reversed = 0;\n        int maxInt = Integer.MAX_VALUE;  // Maximum positive 32-bit integer\n        int minInt = Integer.MIN_VALUE;  // Minimum negative 32-bit integer\n\n        while (x != 0) {\n            int digit = x % 10;\n            int newReversed = reversed * 10 + digit;\n\n            // Check for overflow before adding the digit\n            if ((newReversed > maxInt / 10) || (newReversed == maxInt / 10 && digit > 7)) {\n                return 0;\n            }\n            if ((newReversed < minInt / 10) || (newReversed == minInt / 10 && digit < -8)) {\n                return 0;\n            }\n\n            reversed = newReversed;\n            x /= 10;\n        }\n\n        return reversed;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
